from manim import *

class DecimalMatrixExample(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        m0 = DecimalMatrix(
            [[3.456, 2.122], [33.2244, 12]],
            element_to_mobject_config={"num_decimal_places": 2},
            left_bracket="\{",
            right_bracket="\}")
        self.add(m0)
